class  GisDirectPositionCollection

class  GisIDirectPosition
 The GisIDirectPosition class is a direct position object. GisIDirectPosition is a simple coordinate position in any allowed dimension. The actual object may have several implementations, depending on the dimension and other factors. This is a lightweight helper type for Geometries in the Geometry package. More...
